metadata.title: CVE-2021-44686 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: calibre before 5.32.0 contains a regular expression that is vulnerable toReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) in html_preprocess_rules inebooks/conversion/preprocess.py.

criterions.comment: calibre: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
